title: Ane admonition direct to the trew Lordis mantenaris of the Kingis graces authoritie. M.G.B.
author: Buchanan, George, 1506-1582.
publisher: By Iohn Daye, accordyng to the Scotish copie printed at Striuilyng by Robert Lekpreuik,
notes: Running title reads: Ane admonitioun to the trew Lordis.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
